name: PaMaMe
description: PaMaMe is a journey of companion to a family. Strong bond and relationship create a profound foundation for families. Equal commitment, care, and love given by both PaPa and MaMa gives to their children (Me) is important to a harmonious family. With this idea in mind â€“ PaMaMe is founded. We are dedicated to improve the quality of life for families and children by inspiring parents through building resilience, developing positive self-worth, and mastering emotional intelligence. We offer parents the opportunity to bond and connect with their children through our curated bonding activities and experimental workshops.
